title: For the purpose of Clause 10
clause_text: For the purpose of Clause 10.8.1, the FSI permissible shall not be more than 4.00 plus the Ancillary FSI permissible in these regulations.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
